abstract: Student Opinion | How does a role model influence the lives of those who admire him or her?
snippet: Student Opinion | How does a role model influence the lives of those who admire him or her?
lead_paragraph: People choose their own role models--from older siblings to favorite teachers and even people they have never met. The late Steve Jobs, co-founder and former C.E.O. of Apple, has repeatedly been called a role model in the outpouring of grief since his death in early October. Do you have a role model? If so, does this person's behavior guide you to make the right choices in your life now? Is your role model someone you aspire to be like when you get older?
